methods.javadoc:
Returns the magic COFF file identifier.
@return the magic COFF file identifier
methods.name: getMagic
methods.comment: Returns the magic COFF file identifier.

methods.javadoc:
Returns the number of sections in this COFF file.
@return the number of sections in this COFF file
methods.name: getSectionCount
methods.comment: Returns the number of sections in this COFF file.

return.comment: the number of sections in this COFF file

methods.javadoc:
Returns the time stamp of when this file was created.
@return the time stamp of when this file was created
methods.name: getTimestamp
methods.comment: Returns the time stamp of when this file was created.

return.comment: the time stamp of when this file was created

methods.javadoc:
Returns the file offset to the symbol table.
@return the file offset to the symbol table
methods.name: getSymbolTablePointer
methods.comment: Returns the file offset to the symbol table.

return.comment: the file offset to the symbol table

methods.javadoc:
Returns the number of symbols in the symbol table.
@return the number of symbols in the symbol table
methods.name: getSymbolTableEntries
methods.comment: Returns the number of symbols in the symbol table.

return.comment: the number of symbols in the symbol table

methods.javadoc:
Returns the size in bytes of the optional header.
 The optional header immediately follows the file header
 and immediately proceeds the sections headers.
@return the size in bytes of the optional header
methods.name: getOptionalHeaderSize
methods.comment:
Returns the size in bytes of the optional header.
 The optional header immediately follows the file header
 and immediately proceeds the sections headers.

return.comment: the size in bytes of the optional header

methods.javadoc:
Returns the flags about this COFF.
@return the flags about this COFF
methods.name: getFlags
methods.comment: Returns the flags about this COFF.

methods.javadoc:
Returns the specific target id
@return the specific target id
methods.name: getTargetID

methods.javadoc:
Returns the image base.
@return the image base
methods.name: getImageBase

methods.javadoc:
Returns the machine name.
@return the machine name
methods.name: getMachineName
parseSectionHeaders
methods.comment: Read just the section headers, not including line numbers and relocations

methods.name: parse
methods.comment: Finishes the parsing of this file header.

methods.javadoc:
Returns the sections in this COFF header.
@return the sections in this COFF header
methods.name: getSections
methods.comment: Returns the sections in this COFF header.

return.comment: the sections in this COFF header

methods.javadoc:
Returns the symbols in this COFF header.
@return the symbols in this COFF header
methods.name: getSymbols
methods.comment: Returns the symbols in this COFF header.

return.comment: the symbols in this COFF header

methods.javadoc:
Returns the size (in bytes) of this COFF file header.
@return the size (in bytes) of this COFF file header
methods.name: sizeof
methods.comment: Returns the size (in bytes) of this COFF file header.

return.comment: the size (in bytes) of this COFF file header

methods.name: getOptionalHeader
methods.comment:
Returns the a.out optional header.
 This return value may be null.
